name: Cosmic Pharaoh Dog Passive T3
owner: Pharaoh Dog or Pharaoh Dog King characters.
passiveSkills: Grants +50% increase to all stats in battle
Transform silver effects into a random beneficial effect on self and a random ally every turn
Grant Immunity to Crave and all effects that cause damage to self when healing
Grant 1 Power and 20% Fury to your team for each ally that is currently alive after each action
Revive self with 30% HP and Perfect Heal Shield for 1 turn upon death
This Talisman's effects only activates when equipped to Pharaoh Dog or Pharaoh Dog King characters.
